Localization.Name: NV-TAC
Localization.Description: High-end company known for manufacturing technically precise and experimental optics and weapon attachments. Founded in 2811, NV-TAC initially built sensors for long-range scanning stations and surveying operations before shifting operations to the more profitable personal weapon market. Seen by some as too expensive and feature-dense, but beloved by soldiers and security professionals for their durable design, precision adjustments, and reliable performance.

English.Name: NV-TAC
English.Description: High-end company known for manufacturing technically precise and experimental optics and weapon attachments. Founded in 2811, NV-TAC initially built sensors for long-range scanning stations and surveying operations before shifting operations to the more profitable personal weapon market. Seen by some as too expensive and feature-dense, but beloved by soldiers and security professionals for their durable design, precision adjustments, and reliable performance.

Localization.Name: Delta "Scorched" (1x Reflex)
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: NV-TAC 
Type: Reflex
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 1x - 3x
Aim Time: +2.5%
Aim Recoil: -10%
Visual Recoil: -10%
Parallax: Medium
Size: 1

Ideal for civilians and professionals, the Delta non-magnifying reflex sight from NV-TAC provides a precise illuminated target marker, visible across a wide range of light levels. The Scorched edition features a unique flame patina.
